headline: Vistra Stock Can Gain 78%, Says Pro. Here’s What it’ll Take.
summary: Shares of Vistra (NYSE:VST) are going through a bit of a slump, now down around 24% from its peak. Undoubtedly, the bear seems firmly in control, especially as the S&P chops around following fears surrounding Trump’s new slate of tariffs over Greenland. Undoubtedly, it’s hard to tell if we’re at the start of a vicious ... Vistra Stock Can Gain 78%, Says Pro. Here’s What it’ll Take.

headline: US Stock Market Today: S&P 500 Futures Drop As Growth Jitters And Yields Bite
summary: The Morning Bull - US Market Morning Update Tuesday, Jan, 20 2026 US stock futures are pointing lower this morning, with E-mini S&P 500 contracts down about 1.5% and Nasdaq futures off around 1.8%, as investors react to a mix of global growth signals and rising tension headlines. The IMF now sees the world economy growing 3.3% this year, which sounds encouraging, but it also flags risks from new tariffs and geopolitical flare ups, including tensions around Greenland. At the same time, the US...
